bug.author: isaacmg
bug.description: Wandb sweep on our <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1vl6tgH78bNb9A5JP6NcfFHB189TIjy5c#scrollTo=sTDGweZ0d0QP>primary notebook don't</denchmark-link> advance instead they just stall after the first part of the sweep completes. This is causing problems.

comments.comment: So this appears to be a problem on the Weights and Biases end of things.
This is fixed see original issue.
